message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable asset. I believe this product has the potential to significantly benefit your business. While I can't disclose the exact details just yet, I can assure you its worth is no less than $1500000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. This is a price that reflects the true value of the product, but also allows for a mutually beneficial deal. Please consider this offer carefully, as I'm confident you won't regret it. Let me know if you're interested in learning more.
